title: Typographer.org is back
content:
After a rather large hiatus, [Typographer.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125200142/http:/www.typographer.org/) returns, in a new multi-column format, with regular news stories from the typography world, and comment pieces from Yves and David. Hope you like the new lookâ€¦

[http://www.typographer.org/rss.xml](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125200142/http:/www.typographer.org/rss.xml)
author: Bald Condensed
